plugin.name: binrida
plugin.description: A plugin that allows to stalk, dump and instrument a process using Frida Stalker functionality.
plugin.longdescription:
This plugin allows to stalk a process using Frida stalker. This will aid the reverse engineering activity highlighting the executed path.

It is possible to select to spawn a new process or attach to a new one. Also, it is necessary to select a function.
plugin.author: Andrea Ferraris
